caption.title: 2D-SAROM results for Si.
caption.p: a 2D-SAROM and b EBSD orientation maps of the surface of a polycrystalline Si sample. The colors refer to the orientations shown by the inverse pole figures (inserted). Both, SAROM and EBSD orientation maps have a step size of 13.51 µm, a map dimension of 131 × 120 pixels or 1770 × 1620 µm and an exposure time per step of 60 ms. c misorientation map between SAROM and EBSD data.
